case_name: Administrative Case Re: 08-01789 (Securities Invest - Adversary Proceeding

docket_entries.description: Complaint against Peter B. Madoff, Mark D. Madoff, Andrew H. Madoff, Shana D. Madoff . Nature(s) of Suit: (11 (Recovery of money/property - 542 turnover of property)), (12 (Recovery of money/property - 547 preference)), (13 (Recovery of money/property - 548 fraudulent transfer)), (14 (Recovery of money/property - other)) Filed by Irving H. Picard, Trustee for the Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC. (Sheehan, David) (Entered: 10/02/2009)

Summons with Notice of Pre-Trial Conference issued by Clerk's Office with Pre-Trial Conference set for 12/9/2009 at 10:00 AM at Courtroom 623 (BRL), Answer due by 11/13/2009, (Campbell, Tiffany) (Entered: 10/14/2009)

Certificate of Service of Summons and Notice of Pretrial Conference in an Adversary Proceeding and Complaint Service Executed on All Defendants (related document(s)1, 2) filed by Marc E. Hirschfield on behalf of Irving H. Picard, Trustee for the Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC. (Hirschfield, Marc) (Entered: 10/14/2009)

So Ordered Stipulation signed on 11/23/2009 Extending the Defendants' time by which they may move, answer or otherwise respond to the Complaint up to and including January 8, 2010. with Pre-Trial Conference to be held on 1/14/2010 at 10:00 AM at Courtroom 623 (BRL). (Saenz De Viteri, Monica) (Entered: 11/23/2009)

So Ordered Stipulation, signed on 12/30/2009, Extending the Defendants time by which they may move, answer or otherwise respond to the Complaint up to and including February 15, 2010; with hearing to be held on 2/25/2010 at 10:00 AM at Courtroom 623 (BRL) (White, Greg) (Entered: 12/30/2009)

So Ordered Stipulation signed on 2/5/2010 Between Irving H. Picard, Trustee For The Sipa Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC and Shana D. Madoff. RE: Restriction of Assets (Saenz De Viteri, Monica) (Entered: 02/05/2010)

So Ordered Stipulation signed on 2/5/2010 Between Irving H. Picard, Trustee For The SIPA Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC and Peter B. Madoff. RE: Restriction of Assets. (Saenz De Viteri, Monica) (Entered: 02/05/2010)

So Ordered Stipulation signed on 2/5/2010 Between Irving H. Picard, Trustee For The SIPA Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC and Mark D. Madoff. RE: Restriction of Assets. (Saenz De Viteri, Monica) (Entered: 02/05/2010)

So Ordered Stipulation signed on 2/5/2010 Between Irving H. Picard, Trustee For The SIPA Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC and Andrew H. Madoff. RE: Restriction of Assets. (Saenz De Viteri, Monica) (Entered: 02/05/2010)

So Ordered Stipulation signed on 2/8/2010 Extending the Defendants time by which they may move, answer or otherwise respond to the Complaint up to and including 3/15/2010. With Pre-Trial Conference to be held on 3/31/2010 at 10:00 AM at Courtroom 623 (BRL). (Saenz De Viteri, Monica) (Entered: 02/08/2010)
